distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for xorg-x11-server fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2023-1393: Fixed use-after-free overlay window (ZDI-CAN-19866) (bsc#1209543).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: A flaw was found in X.Org Server Overlay Window. A Use-After-Free may lead to local privilege escalation. If a client explicitly destroys the compositor overlay window (aka COW), the Xserver would leave a dangling pointer to that window in the CompScreen structure, which will trigger a use-after-free later.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
